Hermuncu's Servant:
Hello! My name is Hermuncu's Servant, I woke up to the sound of the Giants, and my mission is their resurrection. Using the power of runes, I for some time, twist space. In other words, let immediately move to another location. This I help Hermuncu's Servant who are looking for the body of the Giants.
For a small fee I provide these services, and born over again warriors, which can use runes in the higher dimensions. Received money will be used to purchase gold for the restoration of the host's body. I recommend You take advantage of my services! If You, of course, already are reborn.
